title: Massive lag
body:
My ping stays at 30ms-100ms which is fine.
My problem is that every 10 seconds or so my screen just freezes for 2+ seconds at a time. It doesn't completely freeze, I get to see a few frames. But stuff like minions and champion health bars disappear altogether. This has never happened before on my computer, it only happened recently. Any advice?

replies.body:
The symptoms you're describing are pretty typical to issues with *Packet Loss*, which occurs if there are issues between your PC and our servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through some local network configurations that we recommend so that your settings are as compatible with League as possible.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.
